summary: Tech encompasses various aspects of technology and its impact on our digital world. It explores topics such as internet fragmentation, ecosystem architecture, and the future of the web. This category delves into how technological advancements shape global connectivity, innovation, and resilience in the digital landscape. It also examines the interplay between technology and other fields like ecology and global affairs, offering insights into the evolving nature of our interconnected world.
excerpt: The internet has fragmented like tectonic shifts, but this isn't necessarily negative. Ecosystem architecture views this as an opportunity for growth and innovation. Different regions have developed unique solutions, making the global internet ecosystem more resilient and diverse.
